item.title: Former USF coach Jim Leavitt faces charges after fight with ex-girlfriend, police say

item.title: 2 children killed, 17 other people injured in shooting at a Minneapolis Catholic school
item.description: Authorities and a hospital say at least five children have been injured in a shooting during the first week of classes at a Minneapolis Catholic school.

item.title: Child swept into storm drain remains in critical condition as investigation continues
item.description: The young girl was found about 200 yards west of where she was last seen.

item.title: Homeowner in crimefighter PJs detains burglary suspect

item.title: Florida official says ‘Alligator Alcatraz’ will likely be empty within days, email shows
item.description: 'We are probably going to be down to 0 individuals within a few days,' an email said.
